data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample MOUNTPLA-222

Exposition SE, Slope 4 deg, Geology: Gneis, lehmiger Sandboden, av. Tree height 8 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 50%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 80%, Vegatation type: Fi-Ta-Wald m. mehr. Gen. Sturm. Alte Fi-Gen. , Film number: 817A
